title: Turn Your Software Ideas To Reality
description: The art of creating software from scratch is a superpower. But it is often considered as complicated and difficult by many due to lack of exposure. This course aims to democratize this skill and empower you to turn your software idea into reality. Let's experience how a real Software As A Service (SAAS) product unfolds from concept to fact.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: A thousand-mile journey starts with a single step. This lesson kick-starts our journey and sets the expectation on what lies ahead.

product-life-fit.title: Product-Life Fit
product-life-fit.description: The critical asset to turn your idea into reality is you. It's the clarity in why you are doing what you are doing that determines how well the journey will be.
